m_szDocTitle: Toyota partner in making wind-power hydrogen for fuel cells | TheLedger.com
m_szDocSumamry: Enlarge Text Toyota partner in making wind-power hydrogen for fuel cells A Toyota fuel cell forklift, front, and a hydrogen fueling station and carrying hydrogen, background, are displayed in Yokohama, near Tokyo, after a press event for Hydrogen Supply Chain Demonstration Project on Monday.
